Structs/MissionLite.html#/s:22RakutenRew.abstract: Mission’s notification type. Example, modal, banner, custom, and none.

Structs/SDKUser.html.abstract: An object that contains information about user, such as getting the user’s

Structs/UnclaimedItem.html.name: UnclaimedItem
Structs/UnclaimedItem.html.abstract: An object that contains information about unclaimed item, such as getting the unclaimed item’s name, action code, instruction, icon url, notification type etc.

Structs/Mission.html.name: Mission
Structs/Mission.html.abstract: An object that contains information about mission, such as getting the mission’s name, action code, instruction, icon url, notification type etc.

Structs/MissionLite.html.name: MissionLite
Structs/MissionLite.html.abstract: An object that contains information about mission, such as getting the mission’s name, action code, instruction, icon url, notification type etc without progress information.

Structs/PointHistory.html.abstract: An object containing a list of point history/records PointRecord.

Structs/PointRecord.html.name: PointRecord
Structs/PointRecord.html.abstract: An object for point record containing date information with number of points for that month.

Enums/RewardSDKSessionError.html#/s:22Ra.abstract: Fail to retrieve session token (internal log-in only).

Enums/RakutenRewardStatus.html#/c:@M@Rak.abstract: SDK is online. SDK status became online after first access to Rakuten Reward service or after service resume.

Enums/RakutenRewardStatus.html#/c:@M@Rak.name: offline
Enums/RakutenRewardStatus.html#/c:@M@Rak.abstract: SDK is offline. Reward’s features is disabled.

Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.name: isUserSettingUIEnabled
Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.abstract: Mission’s achievement notification UI (Banner, Modal, etc) setting. If this setting is set to false,

Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.name: isUserOptingOut
Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.abstract: This setting is to enable/disable SDK features. If isUserOptingOut set to true, SDK features will be disabled.

Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.abstract: This is for the mission + Analytics features (RakutenMissionEvent). Set this to true to enable the feature. By default this feature is set to false.

Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.name: isMissionFeaturedEnabled
Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.abstract: Set this to false to disable Mission feature if you want to use SPS feature only. The default value is true/enabled.

Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.name: isIchibaApp
Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.abstract: This setting is ONLY for Ichiba app. Set to true will enable advertisement deeplink.

Classes/RewardConfiguration.html#/c:@M@R.name: isUsingSDKPortal

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
